About

I am currently working toward a PhD in Artificial Intelligence at the University of Bristol. I'm interested in applying AI to Generative Design. I am part of the Interactive AI Centre for Doctoral Training, as well as the Design and Manufacturing Futures Lab.

Previously, I worked for Open Bionics as the head of the Research and Development team.
